title: Road to perm ban.
body:
This game bores me so I am getting all 12 of my current accounts permed. 

One is already at the last stage. Just a few more reports.

replies.body: congrats man, im on road to bronze 6, wish me luck!

Moving on to the next account.

https://i.gyazo.com/20486a94867da6ad1b1088f6ad8dd9b8.png
